001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonCreator;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
005import org.bitcoinj.base.AddressParser;
006import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
007
008import java.util.List;
009
010/**
011 * For {@code listaddressgroupings} response
012 * Note: In the JSON response this is actually an array
013 */
014public class AddressGroupingItem {
015    private static final AddressParser addressParser = AddressParser.getDefault();
016    private final Address address;
017    private final Coin balance;
018    private final String account;
019
020    public AddressGroupingItem(Address address, Coin balance, String account) {
021        this.address = address;
022        this.balance = balance;
023        this.account = account;
024    }
025
026    @JsonCreator
027    public AddressGroupingItem(List<Object> addressItem) {
028        String addressStr = (String) addressItem.get(0);
029        //TODO: Try to avoid using Double
030        Double balanceDouble = (Double) addressItem.get(1);
031        account = (addressItem.size() > 2) ? (String) addressItem.get(2) : null;
032        address = addressParser.parseAddress(addressStr);
033        balance = Coin.valueOf(((Double)(balanceDouble * 100000000.0)).longValue());
034
035    }
036
037    public Address getAddress() {
038        return address;
039    }
040
041    public Coin getBalance() {
042        return balance;
043    }
044
045    public String getAccount() {
046        return account;
047    }
048}
